name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the luxury brand Fendi cooperated with Korean craftsmen to launch a co-branded bag. Because its design used a weaving technique similar to the Chinese knot, the official account called it Korean craftsmanship in the promotion. This triggered boycotts and dissatisfaction among Chinese netizens. 
Netizens accused "South Korea again... again... stealing our culture" and "Are there not enough major brands copying Chinese elements?" 
Fendi responded: At present, the feedback has been reported to the relevant departments for verification and processing. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkzlID7aoAAb7kP.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 25, Kunshan, Jiangsu. A woman said that she was dissatisfied after being reported for illegal construction, so she reported other people's illegal construction to the relevant departments, but was pushed and insulted by the staff: "If he tells you to eat shit, will you eat shit? Stupid x"
Another staff member said that you should be scolded, you have no right to report others, and if I say you have no rights, then you have no rights. (The mosaics in the video are added by netizens) https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1895142780650815488/pu/img/XEcN7YywxlM66JeJ.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 26, Shandong Urban Investment Company’s financial products collapsed and could not be redeemed. Investors knelt down to the leaders to defend their rights, and the entire company hall was filled with wailing. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1895151765290381312/pu/img/7trAOIBSnjkmpHmB.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 25, Jinan, Shandong. Building 4 of Yuanda Shopping Plaza Center was left unfinished, and the owners were forced to move into the cold unfinished building. The developer not only installed signal blockers to prevent the owners from speaking out live, but also said to the owners, "We Yuanda is just messing around, what can you do about it?" 
One owner said, "The economy is not good now, the factory doesn't pay wages, I have two children, and the house is unfinished again, what do you think I should do?" https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1895150778647556096/pu/img/cWAdxzSuFRfmYpGS.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 25, Tianjin. A one-legged man works two jobs a day. He gets up at 4 a.m. to work at a breakfast shop, and delivers food in the afternoon. He said, "There are many people at home who need me, so I can't stop." https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1895157739564998657/pu/img/YSV0EkV7odsiqLVA.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Two Chinese tourists in their 40s broke into a mountain temple in Jeju City, South Korea on February 24, stole six urns, and buried them 5 kilometers away from the temple. The two then took a flight to leave South Korea on the same day and extorted $2 million from the temple after arriving in Cambodia. In the end, more than 40 police officers entered the mountainous area to search and found six urns. The police have launched an international manhunt for the two men for special theft and obtaining human remains. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gkz4MKJXMAA4OrF.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Trump said Thursday that not only would the United States impose the initially proposed 10% tariffs on all Chinese imports starting Tuesday, but it would now double those tariffs to an effective 20%.
Trump posted on Truth Social that the move was to combat fentanyl: "A large portion of these drugs, including fentanyl, are made and supplied by China" https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gk0X_kTaoAIzyBs.png

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
【RightsCon 2025: A New Path for Digital Protests in China】

On February 27, at the RightsCon 2025 Digital Human Rights Conference in Taipei, the "Tear Down the Great Firewall" closed-door meeting focused on the current situation of online protests in China. Zhou Fengsuo @ZhouFengSuo, Executive Director of Human Rights China @hrichina, pointed out that although China has established the world's most advanced digital surveillance system, the 2022 White Paper Movement proved that free cyberspace can still trigger substantive protests and force the government to adjust its policies. Protesters broke through the information blockade through various channels such as AirDrop and game platforms.

The "Creatives" project continues to promote human rights stories under high pressure and raise funds for creators.

The Li Community team, composed of young Chinese dissidents, initiated the "

Stanford scholar Charles warned people in the technology industry...
fullContent:
【RightsCon 2025：中国数字抗争新路径】

2月27日，在台北RightsCon 2025数字人权大会上，"推倒防火长城"闭门会议聚焦中国网络抗争现状。人权中国 @hrichina  执行主任周锋锁 @ZhouFengSuo  指出，尽管中国建立了世界最先进的数字监控体系，但2022年白纸运动证明自由网络空间仍能引发实质性抗争，迫使政府调整政策。抗议者通过AirDrop、游戏平台等多种渠道突破信息封锁。

" Creatives"项目，在高压下继续推广人权故事，并为创作者筹集资金。

由中国年轻异议者组成的Li Community团队发起"

斯坦福学者Charles警告科技行业人权保护不足，缺少全球治理框架，中国科技影响力持续扩张。

澳大利亚的中国流亡艺术家巴丢草表达了对Twitter等传统平台影响力下降的担忧："我们发现点击量正在迅速下降，这与平台算法变化有关。我们需要不把所有鸡蛋放在一个篮子里，与更多平台合作。"

闭门会议约30多位社会活动人士参加，讨论热烈。面对美国可能减少对人权支持，与会者呼吁建立独立公民网络，通过多平台合作维护信息自由流动，继续在高压环境下捍卫人权与自由。

当被问及当前人权机构面临的困境时，周锋锁表示：“从天安门广场到今天，我始终投身于人权事业。无论中共政权如何强大，都无法改变我的信念。我一直在为那些被噤声的人发声，为因追求中国的民主与自由而受难的人们提供援助。我们的乐观不需要理由，因为我们坚信人的自由与尊严。”

content: On February 27 (release), a petitioner, for the sake of profit, revealed to the subdistrict office that a petitioner named Guo Hong had arrived in Beijing, and said he could help the officials of the Beijing Office find him. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1895338928531742721/pu/img/NN7EJBYnZs1KvgZa.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 27, Guangxi. A man claimed to be a recruit of the Guangxi Armed Police. After joining the army in 2021, he was beaten, threatened, corporal punishment in disguise, and had to practice extra at night. After reporting his experience to the regiment, he was retaliated and was expelled from the army shortly after joining the company. He was also detained by the police for five days. The man said: I served my country as a soldier, but ended up like this.
The video has been deleted. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1895392638897119232/pu/img/Xs64FRys3krg_rmy.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Trump received visiting British Prime Minister Starmer at the White House on Thursday. When asked by reporters whether he still thought Zelensky was a "dictator", Trump paused for a moment and responded: "Did I say that? I can't believe I said that. Next question." Later, at the joint press conference held after the talks, Trump emphasized when talking about Zelensky: "I respect him very much." https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1895398717202759680/pu/img/fp9sfB9R6W_vqdwm.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 28, the Guiyang Intermediate People's Court executed the human trafficker Yu Huaying. Yu Huaying trafficked 17 children between 1993 and 2003. She destroyed 12 families in 11 years, and even sold her own children. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gk3TXR-WIAAn91b.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Suqian, Jiangsu Province, at the exit of Meihua-Guiren Expressway, 2 kilometers away, many private cars occupied the emergency lane, making it impossible for the 120 ambulance to pass. Medical staff were forced to get off the car and walk two kilometers with their equipment. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1895407564076019712/pu/img/mEBCk05Gm_9m2EFE.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On Thursday, Thailand deported 40 Uighur asylum seekers back to China, with Thai officials saying the deportations were made at the request of Beijing. UN High Commissioner for Human Rights Türk called the deportations a clear violation of international law. Overseas Uighur activists condemned the decision. Türk said the asylum seekers were held in poor conditions in Thailand, five of whom died in custody and eight are believed to be still in detention.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A man was diagnosed with cancer. He spent 400,000 yuan on Chinese medicine recommended by a good friend. As a result, his condition worsened and half of his face was gone. … https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1895421131919888384/pu/img/lNWuDLcefkWCpfRF.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: When the Chinese Ministry of Defense criticized Taiwan's expansion of the Han Kuang Exercise, it shouted to the Democratic Progressive Party: "We will come to take you down sooner or later." The Taiwanese Ministry of Defense hit back on Friday, saying in a statement: Beijing has recently been escalating its military threats in the Indo-Pacific and even the world, openly challenging the international order and undermining the status quo of regional stability, and has become the biggest troublemaker in the international community. This year marks the 80th anniversary of the Second World War. History has proven that any form of aggression and expansion will eventually end in failure. The actions of the mainland military in recent years are repeating the mistakes of the aggressors, stubbornly pushing themselves towards defeat.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 27, Shou County, Anhui. A kindergarten school bus in Yanliu Town suddenly caught fire while driving. Local officials said the accident caused 3 deaths. The video shows that a raging fire broke out inside the school bus. A man pointed at the burning school bus and said: "The children are burning inside." On February 17, the local public security issued a document stating that in order to ensure the safe driving of school buses, a safety inspection of school buses in the jurisdiction has been carried out to ensure that every school bus is "healthy" on the road... https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1895426537517883392/pu/img/K4irEesnu4lmE8nG.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Today is the 78th anniversary of the 228 Incident in Taiwan. At the memorial ceremony, Taiwan President Lai Ching-te said that he would apologize on behalf of the country and pay tribute to the victims who bravely faced authoritarianism. In his speech, he used the word "dictator" to describe Chiang Kai-shek, and pointed out that China has not given up the military reunification of Taiwan.
Lai Ching-te said: The troops from the mainland have gone through the Northern Expedition, the Anti-Japanese War, the suppression of bandits, and years of war. "Their living standards are certainly not comparable to those of Taiwanese society. They steal, rob, and destroy. The gap in living civilization has caused social outrage and resentment, and there has been a backlash. In addition, Chen Yi's troops were corrupted in military discipline, and the dictator Chiang Kai-shek committed heinous crimes in order to ensure that he could come to Taiwan to rule when the war situation on the mainland was retreating step by step."
The 228 Incident refers to the fierce conflicts between officials and the public that broke out in various parts of Taiwan from February 27 to May 16, 1947. The people demanded political reforms, and the National Government of the Republic of China eventually sent troops to suppress them by force.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Public account "Gaoniutan": Population winter is a crisis more terrible than the collapse of the real estate market. According to expert research, based on the current fertility trend, China's population will drop sharply to 460 million in 2100, and the aging rate will soar to 42.4% in 2086. … https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gk3ynM2WUAAPGBm.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 28, it was reported that IBM China Investment Company and its branches will cease operations tomorrow, affecting more than 1,800 people. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gk30e0wWcAAlHxj.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, many netizens revealed that DJI has started to get off work at 9 pm. A DJI engineer posted a post on social media to celebrate. He said that it was normal to get off work at 9 o'clock in the morning before. "I have seen Shenzhen Bay at 2 o'clock in the morning countless times." But from today, everything has become history. The company's new policy is to get off work on time at 9 o'clock, and say goodbye to the "king of the clock" life. The engineer also said that he went to work at 10:30 in the morning. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gk337q3X0AAYcCT.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As of February 28, the $LI community project has collected more than 3,084 valid data, including 2,581 high schools. In less than a month, the 611 project collected data from 16.8% of high schools across the country.
After the project was released, schools in many provinces and cities announced delayed school openings, and more contributors gave us feedback that many schools issued similar notices requiring "not to climb over the wall to log in to the external network, not to participate in any survey activities, and not to post online."
Recently, more and more schools have changed their forms and forced students to "voluntarily" participate in tutoring, so

You are also welcome to submit the "Voluntary Application Form" of each school to our mailbox or Telegram submission robot:
Mailbox: humanright@lidao.pro
TG robot:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, some netizens accused the U.S. Embassy in China of enabling the comment filtering function on its official account.
On February 28, the U.S. Embassy in China issued a statement to refute the rumor: the comment filtering function has never been enabled. The United States supports freedom of speech. Since the "giraffe incident" last year, someone has been filtering comments on our social media accounts in China. We strongly oppose this kind of censorship and deletion of freedom of speech and public discussions on our social media accounts. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gk39R7KaQAEcEcj.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 27, a netizen posted a complaint saying that he applied for a passport to attend a concert, but because his household registration was in a sensitive area in Yunnan, his passport was sent directly to the police station by the post office.
When he went to the police station to get it, he was told that he needed to go to the government to apply for it and get it stamped. After going to the government, he was told that he could only take his passport when he went abroad, and he had to report when he went abroad and when he returned. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gk4AdA5XoAA0EMp.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, at a job fair held in Tianhe District, Guangzhou, a trading company recruited reserve store managers with a base salary starting at 2,800 yuan, and a pharmaceutical company recruited pharmaceutical representatives with a base salary of 2,000 yuan for college graduates, 2,500 yuan for undergraduates, and 3,000 yuan for postgraduates. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gk4EYz9agAA_lgy.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 28, the National Bureau of Statistics reported that the GDP for the whole year of 2024 was 134,908.4 billion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 5%.
Netizens said that the comrades of the Statistics Bureau had worked hard, and the growth rate was just 5%, not too much or too little https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gk4MGjubgAAa4gN.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, Aaron Kwok's wife Fang Yuan posted a message saying that she was robbed just after arriving in Milan, with her bag and bank card in her bag, and reminded everyone to take good care of valuables. This has sparked heated discussions.
On February 27, Fang Yuan posted a message saying that the embassy staff was very efficient and handled the matter quickly, which made me feel the warmth of the motherland!
Netizens: "Can ordinary people also feel the warmth of the motherland?" "I have lived in Italy for ten years, and ordinary people who go to the embassy to do business are all rolled their eyes" https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gk4SOOFboAAuRCk.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a parent in Changsha wrote a letter to the Education Bureau, opposing the implementation of a two-day weekend system in high schools, and asked the Education Bureau to maintain last year's one-day weekend system.
The parent said in the letter: "Parents of Changsha high schools oppose two-day weekends." High school learning tasks are heavy, and two-day weekends will affect the learning effect and admission rate of students in Changsha, and two-day weekends will also disrupt teachers' teaching plans. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gk4UHAoXgAEDJ_H.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 28 (Release) It was reported online that a man in Haikou City held up a banner on the rooftop to demand his salary. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gk4YNvcXQAAlCN2.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, US Secretary of State Rubio said: The United States does not want Moscow to become Beijing's "eternal partner"
On February 27, the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs: China-Russia relations are not affected by any third party, and the US's efforts to sow discord between China and Russia are in vain.
On February 28, Wang Yi met with Shao Yigu: China-Russia relations are as stable as Mount Tai, as solid as a rock, and cannot be shaken. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gk4dru-agAAJy4Y.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 26, Beijing. A man fell on the side of the road and was unable to get up. During this time, people kept passing by on bicycles, but no one paid attention, as if nothing had happened.
 Finally, a driver helped to call an ambulance. The driver said: "Don't you feel guilty for not saving people in danger? What's wrong with this society?" https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1895487234364850176/pu/img/BDu_3m4fbXmcadTB.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 28 (Release) "Qin Shuo's circle of friends" forwarded an article: The high mortality rate of the post-80s generation is false, but the psychological difficulties are true. "One out of every 20 post-80s generation has died." The reason why this false data can spread like an epidemic virus may be because it reflects the psychological difficulties of the post-80s generation, activating their inner pain and fatigue, death instinct, self-destructive tendencies, helplessness, confusion, and confusion, thus arousing mysterious recognition. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gk4ltg3XAAAEtvw.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A collection of Chinese officials’ “live by the mountain, live by the water”. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gk4pA1ha0AEmhWU.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Zhejiang Urban and Rural Comprehensive Design Institute has been in a loss-making state in recent years. It has decided to put all employees on standby for three months from the 20th. During this period, the company will pay 2,490 yuan/month for living expenses.
An old employee who has worked in the institute for more than ten years said that he has witnessed the ups and downs of the construction industry over the years. 10 years ago, his parents were proud to introduce themselves to people around them. "It's like a dream. How can I no longer receive projects? How can this industry be completely dead?" https://pbs.twimg.com/media/Gk4r6KqWsAAAUrM.jpg
